fields.summary: SharedScanOptimizer may leave unnecessary operators in the plan

fields.summary: Shared work optimizer may leave useless operator branches in the plan

comments.body:
In a follow-up we shall allow merging of 2 TSs both of which have semijoin branch. 
Also, we should consider running sharedwork optimizer after semijoin branches are removed.
